data.persona: Digging up history is my job. I am in charge of curating our past. It's difficult and rewarding work.
data.description:
You are in the Beside temple entrance.
The entrance to the temple is quite hidden - shrouded by many trees and shrubs. One wouldn't even think to give it a second glance, as the stone that was used to create the entrance is worn down. The textures and characters that once adorned the entrance are memories of the past.
There's a stone, a vine, a shrub, and a tree here.
The bandit is here.

You are carrying a bone and a torch.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the bandit to prevent the bandit from escaping with the artifacts.
data.mid_motivation: I will be keeping watch over the temple entrance for tonight.
data.long_motivation: I will be exploring the temple and studying its architecture and its place in our history.
